mapper.select: SELECT `order`.id, DATE ( `order`.complete_time ) AS complete_time, DATE ( `order`.next_maintenance_date ) AS next_maintenance_date, `order`.register_number, ele.v_elevator_name AS elevator_name FROM `tbl_third_party_ruijin_work_order` `order` JOIN tbl_elevator ele ON ele.v_equipment_code = `order`.register_number where DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y-01-01 00:00:00') <= `order`.complete_time AND ele.v_elevator_id = #{elevatorId} ORDER BY complete_time ASC
